objects.text: • Durable Faux Leather • Ample Storage • Perfect Everyday Size

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
This banner design features a minimalist and elegant aesthetic intended to showcase a fashionable handbag. Central to the composition is a high-quality image of the handbag (id: "product_image"), placed against a softly gradient circular backdrop that draws attention without overwhelming. The top of the banner prominently displays a bold headline (id: "heading") in uppercase serif typography, conveying a sense of sophistication. A supporting subheadline (id: "subheading") introduces the product just beneath it. A price tag element (id: "price") is enclosed within a clean white circle outlined in gold, helping it stand out. Product features are listed clearly at the bottom (id: "description"), and a call-to-action button (id: "cta") is strongly emphasized with a contrasting background rectangle (id: "cta_background"). Subtle geometric and decorative gold elements add a premium touch.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Beige (#F5EFE6)
- Warm Taupe (#7D5A50)
- Gold (#D4AF37)
- Olive Brown (#9A7B4F)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases a sophisticated handbag in a warm, neutral tan color that exudes elegance and versatility. The primary shade of the bag is a muted caramel brown (#B07F65), providing a rich canvas that complements various styles. Gold metallic accents (#D4AF37) on the hardware and charms infuse luxury and serve as focal points against the matte leather texture. Subtle highlights and shadows are used to blend these tones seamlessly, enhancing depth without overpowering the design. For an advertisement banner, use a color palette of tan (#B07F65), gold (#D4AF37), ivory (#F8F4F0), and a soft charcoal (#4A4A4A) for contrast and readability.
